/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the tall buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly beige and brown, with a few showcasing blue and green accents, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. 

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the concrete structures. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
